page.title: 10OAKLAND HOUSE, NEWPORT.
page.content: {Oakland House}is a home for mentally handicapped children. At the home they look after a total of fifteen children. The age of these residential children is from 12 to 19 years. However,some children come just for weekend care and their age is from four years on. The parents of the children who are residents visit in the evenings or at weekends. Most of the children go to day centres where they do things such as cooking, painting and pottery and where the girls can learn about make-up. The children have music, toys, games and television. They also have a trapoline but only certain children use it because of the danger. The residential children have their own rooms,the other children share.
